Cho A(-2,1), B(3,-4). Danh gia cac menh de sau:
questions.hint: BA = -AB. Hai vectơ doi nhau thi nguoc huong.

questions.stem: Trong mat phang Oxy, cho A(1,2), B(5,4), C(3,8). Viet phuong phap toa do de kiem tra tam giac ABC co vuong tai A hay khong.
questions.hint: Tinh AB, AC roi dung tich vo huong AB.AC.
questions.reference_solution:
Ta co AB = (5-1, 4-2) = (4,2), AC = (3-1, 8-2) = (2,6).
AB.AC = 4*2 + 2*6 = 20 != 0.
Vay tam giac ABC KHONG vuong tai A.
Neu muon kiem tra vuong tai A, can AB.AC = 0.
questions.solution: Cach lam: lap vectơ AB, AC -> tinh tich vo huong -> ket luan.
